edu.cwru.sepia.agent

Class ThreadIntermediary

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.agent.ThreadIntermediary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ThreadIntermediary
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    An intermediary allowing for the trading of states and actions between the agent and the environment.
    Author:
    The Condor

      static class  ThreadIntermediary.StateType 
      static class  ThreadIntermediary.ViewAndNextLatch
      A simple structure allowing the return of the current state/history and a latch that indicates when the next state will be ready.

        public java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch submitState(State.StateView stateView,

        Submit a state and its type, receiving a latch for the agent's action.
        Parameters:
        stateView -
        stateType -
        Returns:
        A latch whose countdown indicates that the agent has responded with an action.

      • retrieveState

        public ThreadIntermediary.ViewAndNextLatch retrieveState()
        Get the current state and a latch to await for the next state.
        Returns:
        A structure with a StateView and a CountDownLatch. The former is null when no state was set before.
